name: Claim Jumpers
description:
Compete for total domination of a barren piece of desert in this 2 player, online artillery game.  

Launch your units across the map. Hit enemy units to destroy them, or hit empty terrain to expand the reach of your network of units. Be careful though. Watch out for chain reactions though, because destroying an older unit will also destroy all of its children. And their children. And their children's children...  

Controls:
A/D: Aim left/right
Hold Space: Fire
M: Mute/Unmute music

Click 'Join Game' to start. Once 2 players have joined, the game is launched.

Depending on the number of people online, it may take a while to find a game. If you want to give this a try, you may need to get a friend to jump online at the same time.
